TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAdvice extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens. One example of how to use the SamlAdvice class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion. This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When this constructor is called and the instance is not modified prior to serializing it into XML by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method, an empty `<saml:Advice>` element is generated by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> assertions) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified collection of SAML assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> references) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> references, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> assertions) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type that contains SAML assertions that provide additional information for a SAML assertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified collections of SAML assertions and SAML assertion references.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.

Docs.exception:
contains a element.
-or-
contains a element.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of references to SAML assertions.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The AssertionIdReferences property corresponds to the `\<saml:AssertionIDReference>` child element of the `\<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned by the AssertionIdReferences property is read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of SAML assertions.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `\<saml:Assertion>` child element of the `\<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned from the Assertions property is read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
Docs.value: if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.

A that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
A that can read a clause.
A that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions that contain this XML element.
Docs.summary: Reads the XML element using the specified XML reader.
Docs.exception: The element does not conform to the XML schema for the element.
